item.title: [PI]Making certain items unspawnable problem small fix[PI]
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:7, topic:406888”][code]f (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) ||

playerCommand.startsWith(“pickup”)) {
if (c.inWild()) {

                                            c.sendMessage("You

can’t spawn items in the Wilderness!");
return;

                                            }                       

     
                                                   try {            

                
                                                   String[] args =

playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length

== 3) {
int newItemID =

Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int

newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);

                                                   int

restrictedItems[] =

{8839,8840,11663,11664,11665,8842,19785,19786,13263,19335,11235,10551,1

1694,11696,11698,11700,13858,13861,13864,13867,13870,13873,13876,13879,

13883,13896,13884,13890,13902,13887,13893,13899,13905,19780,14484,16293

,16359,16667,16689,16711,17259,17361,17237,17171,17017,16931,16865,1675

5,19710,18508,4151,18349,18351,18353,18355,13346,13348,13350,13352,1335

4,13355,13360,13358,13362,12470,12472,12474,12476};

                                                   for (int i :

restrictedItems) {
if (i ==

newItemID) {
if

(c.playerRights != 3 && c.playerRights != 2 && c.playerRights != 1 &&

c.playerRights !=0) {

c.sendMessage(“You can’t spawn this item!”);

                                                           return;  

                                                  
                                                           }        

                                           
                                                   }                

                    
                                           }                        

    
                       }[/code]

Throws 26 errors.[/quote]

What the hell is up with your conventions?!?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Making certain items unspawnable problem small fix[PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[quote=“Decronix, post:8, topic:406888”][quote author=Decronix link=topic=503877.msg3686727#msg3686727 date=1311893591]
Maybe add something like


c.sendMessage("Sorry, this is a non spawnable item.");

Under the code for when they spawn it.
[/quote][/quote]

Thank you for reading…

if (playerCommand.equals("item")) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(13)); if(!c.isUnspawnable(newItemID)) { if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item."); } }

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[code]f (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) ||

playerCommand.startsWith(“pickup”)) {
if (c.inWild()) {

                                            c.sendMessage("You

can’t spawn items in the Wilderness!");
return;

                                            }                       

     
                                                   try {            

                
                                                   String[] args =

playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length

== 3) {
int newItemID =

Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int

newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);

                                                   int

restrictedItems[] =

{8839,8840,11663,11664,11665,8842,19785,19786,13263,19335,11235,10551,1

13883,13896,13884,13890,13902,13887,13893,13899,13905,19780,14484,16293

,16359,16667,16689,16711,17259,17361,17237,17171,17017,16931,16865,1675

5,19710,18508,4151,18349,18351,18353,18355,13346,13348,13350,13352,1335

4,13355,13360,13358,13362,12470,12472,12474,12476};

                                                   for (int i :

restrictedItems) {
if (i ==

newItemID) {
if

(c.playerRights != 3 && c.playerRights != 2 && c.playerRights != 1 &&

c.playerRights !=0) {

c.sendMessage(“You can’t spawn this item!”);

item.source: [PI]Making certain items unspawnable problem small fix[PI]

item.title: [PI]Making certain items unspawnable problem small fix[PI]
item.dc:creator: @nL1 nL
item.description:
@nL1 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") || playerCommand.startsWith("pickup")) { if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You can't spawn items in the Wilderness!"); return; } try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); int restrictedItems[] = {}; for (int i : restrictedItems) { if (i == newItemID) { if (c.playerRights != 3 && c.playerRights != 2) { c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item!"); return; } } } }

I don’t like spoonfeeding but here you go.

In the ‘restrictedItems[]’ part of the code, just add every item you want unspawnable, and seperate them with commas, in the playerRights part of the code, that declares that owners and admins totally bypass the spawning limits and can spawn anything.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Making certain items unspawnable problem small fix[PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

317, Project Insanity.

When you try to spawn an item that you are not allowed to spawn, 4151 (whip), it doesn’t say that you can’t spawn it, it doesn’t say anything at all for that matter.

Here is my int that I declared.

[code]public int unspawnable[] = {4151};public boolean isUnspawnable(int

item) { for(int i = 0; i < unspawnable.length; i++) {

if(unspawnable[i] == item)
return true; } return false;}[/code]

Here is my item command

if (playerCommand.equals("item")) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(13)); if(!c.isUnspawnable(newItemID)) { if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item."); } }

Any help would be appreciated.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Making certain items unspawnable problem small fix[PI]
